questions.question: In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face off against a tyrannical Warlord of the Sea who manipulates strings. What is...?
Set in the East Blue, this arc features Luffy's first encounter with a Marine Captain known for his iron mace. What is...?
This arc features a deadly game run by a Warlord of the Sea on an island in the New World. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows its user to manipulate and become light. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to manipulate, produce, and turn into ice. What is...?
This power, used by a high-ranking member of the Revolutionary Army, allows control over the properties of gravity. What is...?
This commander of the Revolutionary Army's eastern forces is known for her ability to turn her body into art. Who is...?
This character, the captain of the Heart Pirates and a key ally of the Straw Hat Pirates, is known for his surgical skills and the Ope Ope no Mi Devil Fruit. Who is...?
This former member of the Royal Shichibukai is known for their Snake-Snake Fruit powers and role as the queen of Amazon Lily. Who is...?
